text: Ðis sind þa landgemæro to Gæinge.
Ærest of lillan hlæwe crundele middeweardan to loddera beorge þonne to grenan hlince westewardan of þan hlince to earnes dune westewearde.
Þonne to holan dic eastwearde andlang þære dic twa furlang norðweard ðonne east be heafdan twa furlang andlang fura andlang weter dene west to þære deopan dene.
Of þære dene to þan readan stane.
Of þan stane eft on lillan hlæwe crundele.
